name: Space Fister
description:
Like punching holes into things? Like taking destiny into your own hands? You are humanity's only hope so let's make this count as you fight a cosmic horror!Just you and your fist. Good luck out there pal!

Report anything that seems like a bug in the comments of the game or email me on support_baiji@gmail.com. I do check every email! Please give feedback!

(best on screen resolution 16:9)

Made by:

Programmer: Kayakaga

Artist: CallMyLawyer
